article.title: Status and history for [ibo]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: [Eric Muller] In addition to the problem resolved by Andrew, the document contains occurrences of a mark below b, h, s, t and space; the mark has been moved below the following vowel if there is one, removed otherwise. Also replaced all the occurrences of U+002D - HYPHEN-MINUS by U+2010 ‐ HYPHEN.

[Andrew Cunningham] The original document uses U+031F ◌̟ COMBINING PLUS SIGN BELOW and U+031D ◌̝ COMBINING UP TACK BELOW, while the standard orthography is to use U+0323 ◌̣ COMBINING DOT BELOW. This has been fixed, as well are removing erroneous sequences of multiple combining marks (probably hidden by incomplete layout engines).
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
